Message.Text: You know, Frank, I just feel like I can’t keep up with these students. Now they’re sharing code on Snapchat, and I didn’t even know that was a thing.
Tommy, it’s not Snapchat. They’re on Discord, which makes a lot more sense for coding. You’re not behind; you just got the app wrong.
But it feels like I’m always one step behind. Snapchat, Discord... I can’t keep track of all these platforms anymore.
Hey, it’s okay! Discord’s really popular now, but it’s easy to confuse things. You’re doing fine.
Still, the fact that they’re using Snapchat for code-sharing and I didn’t know? It’s just... kind of disheartening.
I get that, but they’re not using Snapchat! You’re not missing anything important—it’s Discord. You’ve got this!
I don’t know, Frank. Sometimes I wonder if I’ll ever really catch up.
